t: Amazon Brand Registry | Sell on Amazon

t: Amazon IP Accelerator: Trademark support for your brand
s: Amazon IP Accelerator connects you with a network of vetted legal service providers that offer trademark support and other intellectual-property services.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. t: Get Product Support - Amazon Customer Service
s: If you need help with using your product or if it doesn't work correctly, Amazon provides free Product Support. Among these options are calls, chat, manufacturer contact details, and text or video troubleshooting guides.

t: Help & Contact Us - Amazon Customer Service
s: Visit the Amazon Customer Service site to find answers to common problems, use online chat, or call customer service phone number at 1-888-280-4331 for support.

t: Garanties légales et garanties commerciales d'Amazon - Service client Amazon
s: Vous pouvez obtenir gratuitement une réparation, un remplacement ou un remboursement pendant deux ans après votre achat au titre de la garantie légale de conformité (dysfonctionnement, panne, etc). La garantie légale des vices cachés s’applique également.
